name: Dungeon Raider (Wizard With A Hat)
description: Dungeon Raider is a turn-based, rouge-like dungeon crawler with modern weaponry sprinkled in. Enjoy battling you way through winding dungeons, slaying the inhabitants, and plundering dungeon of it's hidden treasures.  Three difficulty settings, dozen of items to choose from, and four unique bosses to fight no two runs will end the same way. Do you have what it takes?
